message.content: cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL. The paper focuses on computer vision and pattern recognition, which are the main topics of the CVPR conference. The proposed mechanism, DeepSurvey, also involves generating ideas and writing papers, which are related to artificial intelligence and natural language processing (cs.AI and cs.CL). Additionally, the process of reading through all the papers and identifying trends can be seen as a form of information retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the use of deep learning techniques is also mentioned, which is a popular topic in machine learning (cs.LG).
